EmailTemplate.name: 202003_Americas_GDT_Sell-More-from-anywhere_Email.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Sell While Your Sales Staff is Away
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As we deal with uncertain times, it’s even more important to utilize every available resource you can to reach your customers and keep part orders flowing. GoDirect Trade provides an online marketplace for customers to find your parts 24/7—even while your sales team is away.
The ability to reach a large group of customers virtually will become even more critical than it’s been in the past. List your inventory and sell to over 6,200 users across 2,700+ companies.
We know you will love the digital channel and that’s why we’re providing sellers with a no-obligation, 6 months free of charge trial. Click below to launch your storefront in less than five minutes. START SELLING NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/customer/oauth/login/user_type/customer/deeplink/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZ29kaXJlY3R0cmFkZS5jb20vbWFya2V0cGxhY2UvYWNjb3VudC9lZGl0UHJvZmlsZS8=]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Lisa Butters GoDirect Trade <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=Seller_Wizard]]>, General Manager Powered by Honeywell
